ease in after the first shot -
on the floor after the seventh;
spirit's two-80 proof a minute.

ride.
crash.

you lay down
the feel
ensnaring me.
"meant to be" doesn't have to mean "meant to last forever"
Unrelenting unsettled unease undulates under
protoplasmic kiss
indelibly intimate
inherently dangerous
dangerous vulnerability
Necessity lacks the beauty of choice.
I moaned your name to
the walls as the walls inside
me clenched & collapsed
Dijon
Rosemary/thyme/tarragon
Dry white wine
Heavy whipping cream
Potato and leek
it feels like it lasts forever until the first time I felt okay again
if we told the truth
they'd just look at us and say
"that's really fucked up"
